title: Customizable user profile: avatar, cover photo, and bio
constraints: Do not modify read-only frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep all Motoko logic in the single backend actor at backend/main.mo; only add migration.mo if an upgrade requires state migration.
nonGoals: Add new profile fields beyond profile picture, cover photo, and bio.
Introduce third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
